question:
A few diseases such as Mad Cow Disease are caused by Prions. Which of the following is / are features of the Prions?
  1. They are made of protein
  2. They consist of single stranded RNA
  3. They are capable of self replication
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Prions are made up of Proteins and they have no RNA/ DNA. They are not viruses and are known to be the “proteins that cause infections”. Please refer to the wikipedia entry on Prions.
